resources.string: Logging feature is currently disabled. You can enable this in the settings.
Message not yet sent, still in outbox.
Message not sent due to user rules.
Message not sent due to unrecognised message type.
Message not sent because suitable forwarder could not be found.
Message not sent because loading Matrix client failed.
Message not sent because room for that sender could not be created.
Message not sent because Matrix client cannot create child room.
Maximum message sending attempts reached; Message has been dropped.
